title: Twisted Little Games
description: “True love may lay claim on your heart, but first love brands your soul.”Is it possible to love two people at the same time? Of course it is, that’s not the question. The question is should you? Tia finds herself torn between the love of two very different men. Her blind desire for revenge has left her deep in a world of consequences she couldn’t have foreseen. Her carefully woven plans begin to unravel as she learns of secrets and twisted little games that have the power to tear her world apart and destroy everything she’s ever loved.
author: Dee Palmer
